languages.text: "Дальнейшее общение непродуктивно. Воля Омниссии привела нас к этим дверям, и наша задача — скорее отыскать способ проникновения в них и очищение сего чертога".

traits.locale_text: "Не трать более время на досужие разговоры. Коль воля Омниссии привела нас к этим дверям, давай скорее отыщем способ проникнуть за ее створки и узнать, как очистить сей чертог".

languages.text: "Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."
languages.original_text: "Дальнейшее общение непродуктивно. Воля Омниссии привела нас к этим дверям, и наша задача — скорее отыскать способ проникновения в них и очищение сего чертога".

traits.locale_text: "Waste no more time on idle talk. Since the will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, let us make haste and search for a way to proceed beyond them so we can discover the means of cleansing these halls."

"Waste no more time on idle talk. Since the will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, let us make haste and search for a way to proceed beyond them so we can discover the means of cleansing these halls."

"Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

"Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

"Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

"Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

languages.text: “进一步的交谈不会有任何结果。是欧姆尼塞亚的意志把我们带到了门前，因此我们的任务非常明确——寻找可以继续前进的道路，从而找到净化这些厅堂的方法。”
languages.original_text: "Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

traits.locale_text: “进一步的交谈不会有任何结果。是欧姆尼塞亚的意志把我们带到了门前，因此我们的任务非常明确——寻找可以继续前进的道路，从而找到净化这些厅堂的方法。”

languages.text: «Seguir conversando no sería productivo. La voluntad del Omnissiah nos ha traído a estas puertas, así que nuestro deber está claro: encontrar la forma de pasar para descubrir la forma de purificar estas salas».
languages.original_text: "Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

traits.locale_text: «Seguir conversando no sería productivo. La voluntad del Omnissiah nos ha traído a estas puertas, así que nuestro deber está claro: encontrar la forma de pasar para descubrir la forma de purificar estas salas».

languages.text: 「これ以上の会話は非生産的だ。万機神の意思が自分達をこの扉の前に導いた。やるべきことは明白…扉の先へ進む術を見つけ出せば、ホールを洗浄する方法もわかるであろう」
languages.original_text: "Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

traits.locale_text: 「これ以上の会話は非生産的だ。万機神の意思が自分達をこの扉の前に導いた。やるべきことは明白…扉の先へ進む術を見つけ出せば、ホールを洗浄する方法もわかるであろう」

languages.text: "Weitere Gespräche sind hinfällig. Der Wille des Omnissiah hat uns an diese Türen geführt, und damit ist unsere Aufgabe klar – wir müssen einen Weg suchen, um voranzukommen, und herausfinden, wie wir diese Hallen reinigen können."
languages.original_text: "Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

traits.locale_text: "Weitere Gespräche sind hinfällig. Der Wille des Omnissiah hat uns an diese Türen geführt, und damit ist unsere Aufgabe klar – wir müssen einen Weg suchen, um voranzukommen, und herausfinden, wie wir diese Hallen reinigen können."

languages.text: « Trêve de bavardages. La volonté de l'Omnimessie nous a conduits devant ces portes, et notre mission est claire : nous devons pénétrer à l'intérieur et découvrir un moyen de purifier ce bâtiment. »
languages.original_text: "Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

traits.locale_text: « Trêve de bavardages. La volonté de l'Omnimessie nous a conduits devant ces portes, et notre mission est claire : nous devons pénétrer à l'intérieur et découvrir un moyen de purifier ce bâtiment. »

languages.text: "Daha fazla konuşmanın manası yok. Hermesih'in iradesiyle bu kapılara geldik. Vazifemiz açıktır, bu odaları temizlemenin yolunu bulmak için buradan öteye geçmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "Further conversing is unproductive. The will of the Omnissiah has brought us to these doors, thus our task is clear — search for a way to proceed beyond so we can discover a means of cleansing these halls."

traits.locale_text: "Daha fazla konuşmanın manası yok. Hermesih'in iradesiyle bu kapılara geldik. Vazifemiz açıktır, bu odaları temizlemenin yolunu bulmak için buradan öteye geçmeliyiz."
